internationalizations.description:
I'm studying at the Schulich School of Business with a specialization in marketing. I love the bridge between creative and strategic work, everything from looking for patterns in data to creative brand-storming.

Despite my business background, I'm also a writer, designer, and illustrator who loves lending my creative skills to causes I'm passionate about.

3 things you can find me doing in my spare time: making Spotify playlists, watching true-crime documentaries, and organizing my life on Notion!
